程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power

类 PowerHost

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Host
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.HostDynamicWorkload
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.PowerHost
直接已知子类:
PowerHostUtilizationHistory
public class PowerHost
extends HostDynamicWorkload
PowerHost class enables simulation of power-aware hosts.
If you are using any algorithms, policies or workload included in the power package please cite the following paper:
  • Anton Beloglazov, and Rajkumar Buyya, "Optimal Online Deterministic Algorithms and Adaptive Heuristics for Energy and Performance Efficient Dynamic Consolidation of Virtual Machines in Cloud Data Centers", Concurrency and Computation: Practice and Experience (CCPE), Volume 24, Issue 13, Pages: 1397-1420, John Wiley & Sons, Ltd, New York, USA, 2012
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0

  • 构造器详细资料

    • PowerHost

      public PowerHost​(int id, RamProvisioner ramProvisioner, BwProvisioner bwProvisioner, long storage, java.util.List<? extends Pe> peList, VmScheduler vmScheduler, PowerModel powerModel)
      Instantiates a new PowerHost.
      参数:
      id - the id of the host
      ramProvisioner - the ram provisioner
      bwProvisioner - the bw provisioner
      storage - the storage capacity
      peList - the host's PEs list
      vmScheduler - the VM scheduler

  • 方法详细资料

    • getPower

      public double getPower()
      Gets the power. For this moment only consumed by all PEs.
      返回:
      the power

    • getPower

      protected double getPower​(double utilization)
      Gets the current power consumption of the host. For this moment only consumed by all PEs.
      参数:
      utilization - the utilization percentage (between [0 and 1]) of a resource that is critical for power consumption
      返回:
      the power consumption

    • getMaxPower

      public double getMaxPower()
      Gets the max power that can be consumed by the host.
      返回:
      the max power

    • getEnergyLinearInterpolation

      public double getEnergyLinearInterpolation​(double fromUtilization, double toUtilization, double time)
      Gets the energy consumption using linear interpolation of the utilization change.
      参数:
      fromUtilization - the initial utilization percentage
      toUtilization - the final utilization percentage
      time - the time
      返回:
      the energy

    • setPowerModel

      protected void setPowerModel​(PowerModel powerModel)
      Sets the power model.
      参数:
      powerModel - the new power model

    • getPowerModel

      public PowerModel getPowerModel()
      Gets the power model.
      返回:
      the power model
